page.title: 08THE MEDIA
page.content: In our area,we have a few local newspapers: THE EVENING ARGUS:Covers the whole of Sussex with up to date information. THE ENTERTAINER:A free newspaper full of competitions,classified ads,T.V. viewing,and events. THE LEADER:Another free newspaper similar to the 'ENTERTAINER',but with less pages and competitions. We also have two local radio stations: B.B.C. RADIO SUSSEX:(formerly radio Brighton)This channel is not commercial. SOUTHERN SOUND:Has many advertisements and more programmes for children. Television: TVS:Our local ITV channel,stands for 'TELEVISION SOUTH.' B.B.C.SOUTH:Our local B.B.C.channel. By Phillip Codling
